Token.Abstract: Internal category for 'FYClient' to replace host name with arguments from hosts advice, to fulfill this advice on connection problems. Furthermore it is used to replace 'ws' scheme by 'http', if handshake is done asynchronically over a separate NSURLConnection.
Replaces the host in an URL with another host.

Parameter.Name: scheme
Parameter.Abstract: The scheme of the new URL conforming to RFC 1808.

Parameter.Name: host
Parameter.Abstract: The host of the new URL conforming to RFC 1808.
